title: Effect of laws, ordinances, and rules
context: ยง342H-19 Effect of laws, ordinances, and rules. (a) All laws, ordinances, and rules inconsistent with this chapter shall be void and of no effect. (b) Except as provided in section 342H-30&copy;, any county may adopt ordinances and rules governing any matter relating to solid waste management that is not governed by a rule of the department adopted pursuant to this chapter; provided that any county ordinance or rule relating to solid waste management shall be void and of no effect as to any matter regulated by a rule of the department upon its adoption. [L 1989, c 212, pt of ยง4; am L 1994, c 210, ยง5]
